Name: Zen State
Functional Text:
This enters the arena with a balance counter. At the beginning of your action phase, destroy this unless you remove a balance counter from it.

If you would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of that damage.

Name: Ira, Scarlet Revenger
Functional Text: Your second attack each turn gets +1{p}.

Name: Heavy Industry Power Plant
Functional Text:
**Action** - {r}, destroy this: Whenever you **boost** this turn, gain {r}. **Go again**

**Temper**

Name: Arakni, 5L!p3d 7hRu 7h3 cR4X
Functional Text: The first attack with **stealth** each turn gets **go again**.

Name: Art of the Dragon: Claw
Functional Text: When this attacks, if it is Draconic, it gets "When this hits a hero, destroy all cards in their arsenal."

Name: Art of the Dragon: Fire
Functional Text: When this attacks, if it is Draconic, deal 2 damage to any target.

Name: Art of the Dragon: Scale
Functional Text: When this attacks, if it is Draconic, it gets "When this hits a hero, put a -1{d} counter on an equipment they control. Then if it has 0{d}, destroy it."

Name: Flurry Stance
Functional Text:
**Go again**

At the start of your turn, destroy this, then you may attack with each dagger you control an additional time this turn.

Name: Agility Stance
Functional Text:
**Go again**

At the start of your turn, destroy this, then your dagger attacks get **go again** this turn.

Name: Power Stance
Functional Text:
**Go again**

At the start of your turn, destroy this, then your dagger attacks get +1{p} this turn.

Name: Tarantula Toxin
Blood Runs Deep
Functional Text:
This costs {r} less to play for each Draconic chain link you control.

When this attacks a hero, each dagger you control deals 1 damage to them. If damage is dealt this way, the dagger has hit. Destroy the daggers.

**Go again**

Name: Long Whisker Loyalty
Functional Text:
For each Draconic chain link you control, choose 1;

* Target dagger attack gains +2{p}.
* You may attack with target dagger an additional time this turn.
* The next time target dagger hits a hero this turn, **mark** them.

Name: For the Dracai
Functional Text: When this attacks a **marked** hero, create a Fealty token.

Name: For the Emperor
Functional Text: When this attacks a **marked** hero, create a Fealty token.

Name: For the Realm
Functional Text: When this attacks a **marked** hero, create a Fealty token.
